pr_title: Improve WriteScope in ir tree write phase

update scope to include classwriter and methodwriter

replies.bodyText: Agreed, updated scoping to improve the handling for this unique case.

timeline.bodyText: Why does method stuff things into the write scope to just pull them out?  Maybe visitTryCatchBlock can take in a WriteScope?
